item.description:
Bonjour!

On se reunit au Starbucks au Nashua Mall (sortie 6 de la route 3, centre de commerce Burlington Coat Factory) ce mercredi 6 decembre at 19h30 pour parler et raconter ses aventures depuis la derniere reunion.

Prenez le temps de vous decompresser un peu avec nous pendant ce moment frenetique de fin d'annee.

A bientot!

Amy

Hello!

We are gathering at the Starbucks at the Nashua Mall (exit 6 off of Route 3, Burlington Coat Factory shopping center) this Wednesday, Dec. 6, at 7:30 pm to talk and tell a bit of what's been going on since our last meet-up.

Take a moment to relax with us during this charged-up holiday time.

See you soon,

Amy
item.name: Dis-moi French Conversation December Meetup
